class.name: CATCGMAttrId
class.abstract: Class defining the identifiers of an attribute class.

method.name: FindAttrId
method.abstract: Returns the attribute id from a name and a domain name.

method.name: GetAttributeClassName
method.abstract: Returns the attribute class name.

method.name: GetDomainName
method.abstract: Returns the application name .

class.name: CATCGMAttribute
class.abstract: Class representing the attribute that can be pointed to by one or several CATICGMObject.

method.name: AddAttrRef
method.abstract: Adds <tt>1</tt> to the count of CATICGMObjects pointing to <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute.

method.name: Compare
method.abstract: Checks whether two attributes of the same identifier are equal.

method.name: CreateAttribute
method.abstract: Creates an attribute of a given identifier.

method.name: GetCGMAttrId
method.abstract: Returns the identifier of <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute.

method.name: GetNbAttrRef
method.abstract: Returns the number of CATICGMObjects pointing to <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute.

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute is of a given type (or a derived type).

method.name: IsClonableAttribute
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute is manageable by Clone managements.

method.name: IsPersistent
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute is persistent.

method.name: ReleaseAttrRef
method.abstract: Removes <tt>1</tt> to the count of CATICGMObjects pointing to <tt>this</tt> CATCGMAttribute.

method.name: operator!=
method.abstract: Inequality operator.

method.name: operator==
method.abstract: Equality operator.

class.name: CATCGMJournal
class.abstract: Class defining the journal of the topological operations.

method.name: CastToReportItem
method.abstract: Casts <tt>this</tt> into a journal item if possible.

method.name: CastToReportList
method.abstract: Casts <tt>this</tt> into a journal list if possible.

method.name: ForgetObjects
method.abstract: Discards a list of objects from the topological journal.

method.name: GetActiveMode
method.abstract: Returns the activation mode.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of <tt>this</tt> journal.

method.name: MakeAttributesFollow
method.abstract:
DO NOT USE
Automatically reports the attributes pointed by the objects before the operation, on the objects after the operation.

method.name: Release
method.abstract: Use Release when a handler want to unreference a journal that it handles.

method.name: SetActiveMode
method.abstract: Activates or deactivates <tt>this</tt> journal.

class.name: CATCGMJournalInfo
class.abstract: Defines an additional information associated with an journal item.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves <tt>this</tt> item information as a string.

method.name: GetNumber
method.abstract: Returns value of <tt>this</tt> item information.

method.name: SetNumber
method.abstract: Replaces the value of <tt>this</tt> item information.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Affectation operator.

class.name: CATCGMJournalItem
class.abstract: Class defining a single line in the journal.

method.name: CastToReportItem
method.abstract: Casts <tt>this</tt> into a journal item.

method.name: ForgetObjects
method.abstract: Discards a list of objects from the topological journal.

method.name: GetAssociatedInfo
method.abstract: Returns the associated information with <tt>this</tt> journal item.

method.name: GetConstructedObject
method.abstract: Retrieves a pointer to the created object for a creation item.

method.name: GetConstructionObjects
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of construction objects for a creation item.

method.name: GetCopiedIntoObject
method.abstract: Returns the resulting object (for a copy/nocopy item).

method.name: GetCopiedObject
method.abstract: Returns the copied object (for a copy/nocopy item).

method.name: GetDeletedObjects
method.abstract: Returns the deleted objects (Deletion item).

method.name: GetFirstObjs
method.abstract: Returns the initial objects (all item types).

method.name: GetKeptObject
method.abstract: Returns the kept object (Keep item).

method.name: GetLastObjs
method.abstract: Returns the resulting objects (all item types).

method.name: GetNewObjects
method.abstract: Returns the list of objects after a modification or an absorption.

method.name: GetOldObjects
method.abstract: Returns the list of objects before a modification or an absorption.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of <tt>this</tt> journal item.

method.name: MakeAttributesFollow
method.abstract: Automatically reports the attributes pointed by the objects before the operation on the objects after the operation.

method.name: SetAssociatedInfo
method.abstract: Replaces the information associated with <tt>this</tt> journal item.

class.name: CATCGMJournalList
class.abstract: Class representing an aggregation of journal items and journal lists.

method.name: CastToReportList
method.abstract: Casts <tt>this</tt> into a journal list.

method.name: Duplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates <tt>this</tt> CATCGMJournalList.

method.name: FindFirsts
method.abstract: Retrieves the objects that lead to the definition of a given geometric object.

method.name: FindLasts
method.abstract: Retrieves the objects that are created and/or modified by a given geometric object.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of <tt>this</tt> CATCGMJournalList.

method.name: InsertJournal
method.abstract: Inserts an isolated journal list inside <tt>this</tt>.

method.name: Last
method.abstract: Skips to the previous item or list of <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: MakeAttributesFollow
method.abstract:
DO NOT USE
Automatically reports the attributes pointed by the objects before the operation, on the objects after the operation.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Skips to the next item or list of <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: Report
method.abstract: Creates an item inside <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: ReportCreation
method.abstract: Creates a creation item inside <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: ReportDeletion
method.abstract: Creates a deletion item inside <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: ReportKeeping
method.abstract: Creates a keep item inside <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: ReportUnspecModify
method.abstract: Creates an item inside <tt>this</tt> journal list.

method.name: SearchReportsAbout
method.abstract: Retrieves the journals that reference a given geometric object.

method.name: SearchReportsAbout
method.abstract: Retrieves the journals that reference objects of a given geometric type.

method.name: Tass
method.abstract: Tasses the contained items.

class.name: CATCGMOperator
class.abstract: Base class for all the CGM operators.

method.name: GetFactory
method.abstract: Returns the factory of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetOperatorId
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetOperatorId
method.abstract: Defines the name of <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATCGMStream
class.abstract: Class defining the stream to use for the stream and unstream of a single geometric object.

constructor.name: CATCGMStream
constructor.abstract: Constructs CATCGMStream for stream operation (read and write acces are allowed).

constructor.name: CATCGMStream
constructor.abstract: Constructs CATCGMStream for read only stream operation.

constructor.name: CATCGMStream
constructor.abstract: Constructs CATCGMStream for read only stream operation.

constructor.name: CATCGMStream
constructor.abstract: Constructs CATCGMStream for write only stream operation.

constructor.name: CATCGMStream
constructor.abstract: Constructs CATCGMStream for read only or write only stream operation.

method.name: CloseFactoryForRead

method.name: CloseFactoryForWrite
method.abstract: Closes the stream after writing of the content of a CATGeoFactory.

method.name: GetAssociatedContainer
method.abstract: Returns the CATGeoFactory used with a OpenFactoryForWrite/CloseFactoryForWrite or OpenFactoryForRead/CloseFactoryForRead operation.

method.name: GetNumberOfBytesToRead
method.abstract: Returns the number of bytes that remains to read.

method.name: OpenFactoryForRead
method.abstract: Opens the stream for reading the content of a CATGeoFactory.

method.name: OpenFactoryForWrite
method.abstract: Opens the stream for writing the content of a CATGeoFactory.

method.name: PrepareToObjectStreaming
method.abstract: Prepares the object streaming.

method.name: PrepareToObjectUnstreaming
method.abstract: Prepares the object unstreaming.

method.name: PrepareToProcessAnObject
method.abstract: Prepares the stream to process an object.

method.name: ReadCrvParam

method.name: ReadGeometryV5

method.name: ReadKnotVector
method.abstract: Reads a CATKnotVector.

method.name: ReadLinkedObjectsCount
method.abstract: Reads the linked objects count.

method.name: ReadListOfLinkedObjects

method.name: ReadObject

method.name: ReadSurLimits

method.name: ReadSurParam
method.abstract: Reads a CATSurParam.

method.name: ResetToRawBehaviour

method.name: SkipRemainingInformationsToRead
method.abstract: Skips over remaining informations to read.

method.name: SkipRemainingLinkedObjectsToRead
method.abstract: Skips over remaining linked objects to read.

method.name: WriteCrvLimits

method.name: WriteCrvParam
method.abstract: Writes a CATCrvParam.

method.name: WriteGeometryV5

method.name: WriteKnotVector

method.name: WriteLinkedObjectsCount

method.name: WriteListOfLinkedObjects
method.abstract: Writes a (partial or total) list of linked objects.

method.name: WriteObject
method.abstract: Writes a linked object.

method.name: WriteSurLimits
method.abstract: Writes a CATSurLimits.

method.name: WriteSurParam

class.name: CATCGMStreamAttribute
class.abstract: Class representing the persistent attribute that can be pointed to by one or several CATICGMObject.

method.name: AddLink
method.abstract: Attaches CATICGMObjects to <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute.

method.name: GetLinks
method.abstract: Retrieves all the links from <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute to a CATICGMObjects.

method.name: RemoveLink
method.abstract: Removes the link from <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute to a CATICGMObjects.

method.name: SetLinks
method.abstract: Replaces all the links from <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute to a CATICGMObjects.

method.name: Stream
method.abstract: Translates <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute into a byte sequence that can be later saved.

method.name: UnStream
method.abstract: Copies into <tt>this</tt> CATCGMStreamAttribute, the translation of a byte sequence that has been previoulsy streamed for an CATCGMStreamAttribute.

class.name: CATCloneManager
class.abstract: Class representing the process of duplication of a CATICGMObject.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a CATICGMObject to clone with <tt>this</tt> CATCloneManager.

method.name: ReadImage
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the CATICGMObject (called "image") corresponding to the clone by <tt>this</tt> of a given <tt>iObject</tt>.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the CATCloneManager process.

method.name: WriteReport
method.abstract: Writes the topological journal associated with <tt>this</tt> CATCloneManager process.

method.name: WriteReport
method.abstract: Writes the topological journal for one object.

class.name: CATCrvEvalCommand
class.abstract: Class representing a command for computing a multiple evaluation on points of a CATCurve.

constructor.name: CATCrvEvalCommand
constructor.abstract: Constructs a command with no specified evaluation.

method.name: IsSetToEval
method.abstract: Tests whether a specified evaluation belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: IsSetToEvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Tests whether the first derivative evaluation belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: IsSetToEvalPoint
method.abstract: Tests whether the point evaluation belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: IsSetToEvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Tests whether the second derivative evaluation belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: IsSetToEvalThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Tests whether the third derivative evaluation belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: OrderEvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Adds the first derivative evaluation to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: OrderEvalPoint
method.abstract: Adds the point evaluation to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: OrderEvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Adds the second derivative evaluation to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: OrderEvalThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Adds the third derivative evaluation to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvEvalCommand.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets all the specified evaluations on a CATCurve.

data.name: EvalFirstDerivative
data.abstract: The command for the evaluation of the curve first derivative only.

data.name: EvalPoint
data.abstract: The command for the evaluation (3D point) of a point on a curve.

data.name: EvalSecondDerivative
data.abstract: The command for the evaluation of the curve second derivative only.

data.name: EvalThirdDerivative
data.abstract: The command for the evaluation of the curve third derivative only.

data.name: EvalUpToFirstDerivative
data.abstract: The command for all the evaluations of the curve up to the first derivative.

data.name: EvalUpToSecondDerivative
data.abstract: The command for all the evaluations of the curve up to the second derivative.

data.name: EvalUpToThirdDerivative
data.abstract: The command for all the evaluations of the curve up to the third derivative.

class.name: CATCrvEvalLocal
class.abstract: Class representing an object that handles the results of a multiple evaluation of a point on a CATCurve.

method.name: GetFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Retrieves the evaluation of the first derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the evaluation of a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Retrieves the evaluation of the second derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Retrieves the evaluation of the third derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: GetValues
method.abstract: Retrieves all the evaluations at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: SetCommand
method.abstract: Replaces the types of evaluation of a CATCrvEvalLocal.

method.name: SetFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Sets the evaluation of the first derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets the evaluation of a point on a CATCurve.

method.name: SetSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Sets the evaluation of the second derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

method.name: SetThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Sets the evaluation of the third derivative at a point of a CATCurve.

class.name: CATCrvEvalResult
class.abstract: Class representing an object that handles the results of a multiple evaluation on points of a CATCurve.

method.abstract: Releases the memory unused by the internal grids of points and vectors of a CATCrvEvalResult.

method.name: GetFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Returns the evaluation of the first derivative at the points of a CATCrvEvalResult.

method.name: GetPoints

method.name: GetSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Returns the evaluation of the second derivative at the points of a CATCrvEvalResult.

method.name: GetThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Returns the evaluation of the third derivative at the points of a CATCrvEvalResult.

method.name: SetCommand
method.abstract: Defines the types of evaluation of a CATCrvEvalResult.

method.name: SetNumberOfPoints

class.name: CATCrvLimits
class.abstract: Class representing the limitations of a CATCurve.

constructor.name: CATCrvLimits
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCrvLimits from two CATCrvParams.

method.name: AddInside
method.abstract: Replaces <tt>this</tt> by a CATCrvLimits that also contains a given global parameter.

method.name: AddInside
method.abstract: Replaces <tt>this</tt> by a CATCrvLimits that also contains a given CATCrvParam.

method.name: AddInside
method.abstract: Replaces <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits by its union with another CATCrvLimits.

method.name: DistanceTo
method.abstract: Returns the distance of a parameter to the nearest point of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetEquivalentLimits
method.abstract: Retrieves the CATCrvLimits having the same relative positioning to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits than <tt>iRefLim</tt> in <tt>iRefAll</tt>.

method.name: GetEquivalentLimits
method.abstract: Retrieves the CATCrvLimits having the same relative position to <tt>this</tt> CATSurLimits than iRefPart in an isoparametric curve of RefAll.

method.name: GetEquivalentParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the global parameter having the same relative position to <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits than <tt>iRefParam</tt> in <tt>iRefAll</tt>.

method.abstract: Retrieves the global parameter having the same relative position to <tt>this</tt> CATSurLimits than iRefPart in an isoparametric curve of <tt>iRefAll</tt>.

method.name: GetExtremities
method.abstract: Retrieves the extremities of a 1D box corresponding to the global parameters of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetExtremities

method.name: GetHigh
method.abstract: Retrieves the high CATCrvParam of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetHighArcNumber
method.abstract: Returns the arc number of the high limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetHighLocalParam
method.abstract: Returns the local parameter of the high limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetHighParam
method.abstract: Returns the global parameter of the high limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetLocalExtremities
method.abstract: Retrieves the extremities of a 1D box corresponding to the global parameters of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetLow
method.abstract: Retrieves the low limitation of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetLowArcNumber
method.abstract: Returns the arc number of the low limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetLowLocalParam
method.abstract: Returns the local parameter of the low limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: GetLowParam
method.abstract: Returns the global parameter of the low limit of <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Use preferably the signature which takes as an input argument the tolerance.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Use preferably the signature which takes as an input argument the tolerance.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATCrvParam is inside a CATCrvLimits at a given tolerance.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATCrvLimits is including another CATCrvLimits.

method.name: IsEmpty

method.name: IsIntersecting

method.name: SetLow
